String.string: Suspect X
"That's probably a good idea.".
Monster of Mysterious Ruins
Defeat Monsters in Mysterious Ruins.
Mysterious Ruins
Members of the Free Traders Collective are gathered in the ruins.
Look for the Free Traders Collective group in the Mysterious Ruins.
"We do. I'll be in touch."
Talk to the Free Traders magister.
Shrine of Yurian
Members of the Enlightened Union are gathered at the shrine.
Look for the Enlightened Union group in the Shrine of Yurian.
"Okay. You've told me everything I need to know, anyway."
Talk to the Enlightened Union magister.
Arun Heights
Members of the Iron Order are gathered in the ruins.
Look for the Iron Order group in Arun Heights.
"You've made your point. I'm leaving."
Speak with the Iron Order magister.
"I've got it. I'll find him and get some answers."
Speak with Adria.
